website_summaries.verdict: The GoPro Hero3 Silver and White editions are strong contenders in the sports camera market, but the faster, more powerful Black Edition is head and shoulders the best sports camera on the market today.
pros: The GoPro Hero3 is smaller, lighter, and features built-in Wi-Fi connectivity.
The Black Edition offers a number of ultra-high-resolution capture modes and high frame rates for standard HD resolutions
burst speeds for still photos has been greatly improved
cons: GoPro's control scheme has a longer learning curve than the simpler slide-n-go setup of the Contour cameras
Only 15fps on 4K video renders this selling point mostly moot for action videography

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Some will say there is little difference between the HERO3 White and the HERO but that's not true. The HERO3 has the added benefits of wifi (enabling you to use the GoPro app and remote), LCD backpack compatibility, and time lapses at intervals other than .5s. I've had some issues with rolling shutters but thats an easy fix during editing.
customer_reviews.author: Jcf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my uses
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this little camera that can take a beating. My main use is capturing footage during mudding and it performs perfectly. The waterproof case is truly waterproof and you can throw this off a cliff and I'm sure it'll survive. The sheer number of accessories you can buy to suit your needs is crazy; things like a bright red floater for water usage, mounting to a surfboard somehow, a skeleton housing for when there's no water danger (for better sound). There are also a lot of mounts to be had so that's awesome. You DO need to get your own memory cards and a way to transfer the data onto a computer.
customer_reviews.author: Frog Hat

customer_reviews.title: This has been an amazing gift. We also bought the outdoor sports essentials ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend who has been traveling across the country on a bicycle. He has had a blast using this GoPro, taking pictures and videos. The pictures and video have been clear. He shares the pictures and videos with my husband and I on Facebook every few days. This has been an amazing gift. We also bought the outdoor sports essentials kit bundle to go with the GoPro. My husband wants one now. Lol
customer_reviews.author: SaltoftheEarth

customer_reviews.title: This little camera is great, and takes awsome footage, especially on a racing drone.
customer_reviews.text: the fpv came most racing drones come with and transmitters mean poor video quality but this is very watchable and economical. good battery life, good quality of the video, More than worth what I paid even though it did not ship with the underwater case, I had to order that independently latter. Hope this helps, I'll add some video latter
customer_reviews.author: W.

customer_reviews.title: not much different than the original gopro heo
customer_reviews.text: i misplace my original gopro for a few weeks and decided to purchase this as a replacement. i don't see the difference between this and my original. so if you were thinking of an upgrade hold off. if this is your first gopro and go for it. none of my gopros have worked well in the cold. the fogging inside the case and the sticky mounts do not hold on in the cold. if you use it in warmer temps, they work well. it's nice that all the mounts work for all editions of the gopro heros.
customer_reviews.author: dpangster

customer_reviews.title: Waiting to use it still
customer_reviews.text: Everything reached in time, then found out it has no included micro-SD card. NOTE: Buy this also. The tech specs says "battery needed (included)", but does not mention anything about memory being excluded This is the second GoPro. The first one, been used for a year, works great. It's a goPro 2. Ordered this in prep for a weeklong trek. So ordered camera, spare batteries, monopod etc. The older GoPRO used SD Card, I have spares, however, since this needs micro-SD, ordered and waiting. If it does not reach in time, will land up buying locally.
customer_reviews.author: celamin

customer_reviews.title: Good camera but not great
customer_reviews.text: Very rugged, great images, highly versatile. Can be very finicky to work with. The battery life is not what I would expect and for my purposes of recording track sessions I switched to a hard wired set up. The remote (sold separately) is highly variable as well. Usually no problem linking up to two cameras when batteries are strong but the battery in the remote is finicky as well. Also, for some reason the date and time change frequently and this can be very frustrating when you are trying to sort your videos.
customer_reviews.author: Yancey

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted... only one day unfortunately!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and immediately charged it up and went for a surf to get some good footage. The first 30 photos were great but then the colors all changed to neon green, pink, and purple - like a bad Photoshop experiment. I reached out to GoPro tech support and they said it was a defective model. Thankfully Amazon let me do a return rather than wait a couple weeks for an exchange with GoPro directly. I ended up ordering the GoPro 3+ and was happy with how much lighter and better the battery lasted (and less condensation inside the housing too).
customer_reviews.author: Supagruv

customer_reviews.title: Superb product. Too bad the newest edition is actually a step backwards.
customer_reviews.text: I used this GoPro HERO3: White Edition on a week long dive trip to Roatan. The video is superb and the wide angle is excellent with no visual distortion. I bought this older edition because the new White Edition is only waterproof down to 131' vs this which is waterproof down to 197'. I have had no issues with firmware or lost data. This is my first GoPro but I will likely be a customer for life if they keep producing such high-quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled!
customer_reviews.text: This item does NOT include a 197'/60m dive case. It's the 40m case instead that actually has small holes to better capture audio. Pay $20 lass and get the Hero3 white that is actually labeled correctly.
customer_reviews.author: henazo

customer_reviews.title: Such a great camera to carry with you
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great camera. It's very portable and you can take it with you everywhere because it doesn't take much space at all. And when you are doing specific activities there are hundreds of different attachments for it. From water proof cases, to external microphones, you can make it adapt to your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Sulfen

customer_reviews.title: Aerial Photo-Videography
customer_reviews.text: This camera, purchased separately, along with a DJI Phantom, RC Quadcopter is fantastic! Putting this versatile camera up in the air a thousand feet on a stable, flying platform is the best for the money. The camera's settings seem made for this, which is not news to current users, but I'm impressed as a first time buyer. If your looking for one for the same Phantom platform to fly on, you don't need or want the waterproof case. If its sold that way. All Great ! Scott
customer_reviews.author: SEH

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't possibly be any happier with this product
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't possibly be any happier with this product. I bought this months ago for vacation in order to take videos from the pool and from in the ocean. Recently I have been using it along with my helmet mount while I ski! Great video and great footage!! Must have for anybody looking to get personal view videos!
customer_reviews.author: Frank R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera, but they get you with the accessories!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas and it works great! We took it to Hawaii and got great footage from our hike, snorkeling, and paddle boarding. My only criticism is for the GoPro company that makes you purchase all the mounts, clips, chest strap, head straps, and accessories SEPARATELY! You could literally spend thousands purchasing all the accessories, it's a crime. Also, this edition (white) did not come with a manual. Luckily if you google a manual you can find it online.
customer_reviews.author: starvinartist

customer_reviews.title: What else can I say ... best there is!
customer_reviews.text: Was wondering what all the hype about this little thingy was about for a while. Decided to buy one and see for myself. OMG! I am impressed. I am still a newbie when it comes to being an action videographer. But I am certainly having a lot of fun using my GoPro recording everything and anything and later editing it to make memorable video clips. I guess the fun never ends when you have a GoPro!
customer_reviews.author: Eric L

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a few months
customer_reviews.text: Camera arrived and everything worked great for a few months. Think the battery that came with the unit was old and/or used. It doesn’t hold charge at all anymore. The screen also doesn’t show anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: PROBLEM WITH PRODUCT ONLY AFTER 5 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift. It worked fine when we got it. Then it started deleting videos and not recording. Light shows it is but nothing is recorded. We thought product needed updating we updated same problem. if it does record the clips are no longer than 7mins....any one having this issue?? what can we do ?? for that price i do hope we can get that fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Yaki

customer_reviews.title: Fighters are very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Servers my Ukrainian friend in an anti terrorist operation in an Eastern Ukraine. Fighters are very happy with this product. It saved many lives.
customer_reviews.author: A. Vatr

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the one I burned up in the Atlantic after a drone crash off the Bahamas -- 18 freakin' inches off the Bahamas. Love this camera. The 4 Generation leaves this slot empty. The 3 White, fills a gap between absolute basic and too many bells and whistles. This is a GoPro for people who have a lot of other cameras. I hope GoPro brings this level of price/functionality back into the line up.
customer_reviews.author: BBQ Porkins

customer_reviews.title: WiFi to my phone is great!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first. I have a HERO 2 and it works great. The only reason I bought this was to send into space, but the WiFi feature is awesome and I can use it for a bunch of things. Haven't really tried it in low light, but I'm not holding too much hope out for that.
customer_reviews.author: Rogue

customer_reviews.title: camera is good, the case not so much.
customer_reviews.text: have been usign goprog since series 1 on my racecar. for a rugged sports camera, gopro seems to be losing its way. All of the series 3 cameras, for isntance, have a big square glass lense on the casing. This typically lasts only 1-2 weekends on the car before the lense gets cracked. The glass lense is just too brittle, and the new square design is just too big for use as a proer sports camera. Have also lost 3 cameras over the years due to the mounts breaking. Despite this, gopro is still the standard in thsi area, so I keep buying more.
customer_reviews.author: JeffG

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a trip to Madagascar but found it difficult to use and the video not that great and ended up using a small point and shoot camera with video capabilities instead of this. I gave this, and all the extras I bought (battery, charger, floaty back) to my son for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora14

customer_reviews.title: Bug Issues
customer_reviews.text: I liked the camera but after shooting a few test videos, the wifi button quit working. Tech support said I needed to do another software update. The 1st one took 50 minutes on the phone with a tech having to walk me through the process, since I am not too tech savy. Possibly the Silver and Black editions have better software. I sent it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: R. ingram

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Great camera at a good price. Works with all the GoPro accessories and studio programs. A good value with good quality. Works well with Gimbal stick for smooth and steady picture and video.
customer_reviews.author: BILLB

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it fits your needs.
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a niche product. If you're hoping to take photos at the drop of a hat, look elsewhere.The pictures and video it takes are quite respectable, but they do come with a fisheye effect that you'll have to correct for. As far as I could tell, the official software is only designed to work with video, so I wound up using GIMP to fix photos.
customer_reviews.author: minifig

customer_reviews.title: Great looking videos.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a champ. The video quality is great and the waterproof housing does what it is supposed to do. The controls are easy to work and downloading the videos is a snap. I recommend this to anyone wanting action footage or just good clean videos.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing video quality and it was put to the test ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a wedding gift and after seeing how it performed I can now see that we must have one under the tree at our house this year! Amazing video quality and it was put to the test in Hawaii. Price point was great too.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works. GoPro support is awful though. Good luck getting help if it fails.
customer_reviews.text: I know this can be a great camera, but the case leaked the very first time we used it and the water killed the camera. So we paid hundreds of dollars for nothing. When we complained to gopro they would not do anything to help. No refund, no repair, nothing. Didn't even ask to see it to determine if the case was faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Gammacula

customer_reviews.title: great gift for an active kid
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my active son. You will need to buy a memory card, and mounts for this, as it comes with just the camera, battery, and cable. Easy to set up, easy to use. Waterproof and nearly indestructable for a kid.
customer_reviews.author: MommaSR

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter but she used it skiing & it is great. The lens has enough fish-eye to not be ...
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift to my daughter but she used it skiing & it is great. The lens has enough fish-eye to not be overly sensitive to where it is aimed but not enough to distort. A very fun camera. Be prepared to buy lots of accessories though.....
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for his birthday. Used it for the first time immediately after purchase on a shark diving trip...excellent quality!!! Hubby took it on deployment with him and has enjoyed being able to easily record with the helmet attachment. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Ebrooks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to use and the video footage is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Marc R. Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it does
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed my GoPro. My biggest complaints are the poor battery life, which I knew about before I bought it, and the limited features. The more I use my GoPro the more I wish I had gotten the Black edition. If all you want to do is just take video and not do much with it then the white is the way to go. For everyone else I'd suggest the Black edition.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love the camera preforms great
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera preforms great. The case handle was broken after few years but got it replaced. The case preform great in dives for all that time.
customer_reviews.author: Tomer Nahum

customer_reviews.title: He loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a gift for my boyfriend and he loves it. He uses it whenever he can and it takes awesome video and pictures. Takes a little getting use to especially when setting it up but it's fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Aren

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera and absolutely love the WiFi feature. I have an iphone and the app works flawlessly and allows me the freedom to control the settings, recording and playback without the need for exiting my vehicle or being next to my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Falconi

customer_reviews.title: Best sport camera out there
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed.... This camera is better then I thought it could be in this size. the clarity in all modes is fantastic and so easy to use. I have gone 125 feet deep with low light. you would think I had lights with it. no leaks at all. Dont use any other camera now.
customer_reviews.author: john j nova

customer_reviews.title: Poor low-light performance
customer_reviews.text: OK for the price, but does poorly in low-light conditions, and sound quality not great.
customer_reviews.author: KLC108

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a versatile and wonderful camera that can be used in all sorts of situations. Small and light it will fit in your pocket. Great for action shots of all kinds. Great picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Snibbe

customer_reviews.title: Had to return camera
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the product because of issues with recorded footage. My first thought was a bad memory card but a Best Buy rep assured me after analyzing that it was an issue with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Wallace

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, love love the GoPro!! Works great. The waterproof cover is great. It does of course cut the sound out quite a bit. Attatched to our dog via harness-very cool!
customer_reviews.author: cindy felton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera. Bought it refurbished and I haven't had ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera. Bought it refurbished and I haven't had any problems. Wifi works great, picture and video quality is amazing. Great starter camera and will more than likely end up buying a hero4. SD class 10 ultra is recommended, 64 gb
customer_reviews.author: Robles

customer_reviews.title: Good pictures
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised used in ocean just wish I got to use it more
customer_reviews.author: Real Reviews

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: bought the white one works well enough for me. I wouldnt know the difference between the models.... the wifi kills the battery fast so leave it off and youll have great battery
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Did Research, Works Perfect !!
customer_reviews.text: Did my Research knew what I needed. Has what everything I was looking for. Works perfect, just not the easiest to update software on either of GoPro's.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: The latest version of THE Portable Video Camera
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my old Hero-1 for the latest version that supports the wireless remote control. My camera is mounted above and behind my head of my Formula Ford race car, so once belting into the tiny car, there was no way to turn the camera on. With the remote in the cockpit with me, I can start videoing right when I head out on-track. So I not only have convenient control, but can eliminate the silly footage whle I sit on the grid waiting to go. T. Stewart, Camarillo, CA
customer_reviews.author: T. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Awsome!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera!! Unbelievable lightweight! If you want make some quality video about yourself, trips, sports, underwater, etc... with a low cost, this is the camera for you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GoPro HERO 3
customer_reviews.text: Great awesome product. Extremely clear picture. I used it on my JetSki and it works wonderful. The water and waves come out extremely clear while in motion.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good camera, great picture quality and product quality...fast shipping...thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Domínguez

customer_reviews.title: Needed it. Got it. Use it
customer_reviews.text: I am currently doing a lot of skydiving, wakeboarding, scuba diving and other high pace activities. I have been looking for a go pro for a good price for a while and I found this one. There is no manual with the camera and the mounts are not the full set you would see in other packages, but at this point, the seller had the camera shipped very quickly, and all the pieces work perfectly. I am very happy about this camera.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good for my son's first camera.
customer_reviews.text: A good camera, but read the difference between the white, silver and black before you purchase. There are many features of the white that are missing from the silver or black. You get what you pay for. For example, the video wide angle coverage in this white edition at 1080p is NOT as wide as in the Black edition. The still images are not as high a resolution, but that's not a big deal. White does not allow spot metering, white does not allow setting manual white balance. If those are features you want, you got to step up to a more expensive version. Other than that, its a goPro and works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: It's like when you get it like I finally own one of these cameras and then what really bugged me is when I kept on editing it had those old movies effects where you can see the ripples and s*** some effect from the late 1990s era but is cool I guess
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Get the black, I didnt know it was that much nicer, theres a reason its more expensive, this product is good just hard to set up, seller is great.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I and my son who I bought the product for for a Christmas present was very pleased with the gift. I had also bought some products along with the GoPro Hero3 like the battery pack and the 32 gb card and he was surprised as well as excited to have for his camera. I have had many camera's in my life time and I have to say that I find this is by far one of the best cameras I've ever bought and this is why I've givenn the rating I have.
customer_reviews.author: J Fred Walcott

customer_reviews.title: Say Cheese
customer_reviews.text: This was a wedding present for my grandson and his wife. They love it. They promised me pictures to come in the years ahead!
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: I've been able to document our family hikes and vacations through the mountains, and also show people why we love to snorkel so much when we're at the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gingerich

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, received it with minor damage
customer_reviews.text: One of the legs on the waterproof clear case was broken. The camera is working well and it's out of stock in Amazon right now, but since this had to be shipped to a navy base overseas, we won't have time to get a new one elsewhere on time for Christmas, so we'll keep it as is.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Ardila-Rey

customer_reviews.title: Cool camera
customer_reviews.text: Very cool camera but you will definitely want to order extra batteries. I suggest Wassabi: two batteries and a charger for cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Browne

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot except it doesn't turn on even when it's fully charged. I have to press the button five times before it finally turns on. It doesn't connect to my computer. Sometimes it does but lately it hasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Donna

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: If i could, i would give this no stars. It worked fine at first, but the battery expanded, and the camera sometimes doesn't record at all, and the mount didn't seal properly and I had to replace it myself
customer_reviews.author: Benjie

customer_reviews.title: He is very happy with his new Hero3
customer_reviews.text: After a disappointing loss at black rock on Maui where my son lost his "Hero" trying to climb up the rock to dive. Hero broke off his stick, check for crackes. He is very happy with his new Hero3.
customer_reviews.author: David Farinsky

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted for my flying vacation to Alaska. Videos are crisp, clear and it's a great way to record those moments you don't want to forget. Easy to use with or without the great iPhone app. Highly recommend at least skimming the manual first, I was able to figure it out, but less inclined people might have a little trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Judy II

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the product. fully met expectations. Many thanks to you guys! A really good product! Recommend to everyone!!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the product. fully met expectations. Many thanks to you guys! A really good product! Recommend to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: But good product. Wouldnt buy again
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is awful. But good product. Wouldnt buy again though
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: item did not always function properly, have to remove battery to power off!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Patterson

customer_reviews.title: cristmas present
customer_reviews.text: bought for the wife for Christmas. it is very small and light weight and seem to take nice pictures and video
customer_reviews.author: claude wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: If you have the money, definitely invest in the black version. The white is definitely a good buy but lacks a little on video quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Catubig

customer_reviews.title: Good product but consider the ad-ons
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of the GoPro and it's a solid execution. I don't miss any of the features of the more expensive versions and the video/picture quality is excellent. Just consider the ad-ons you will need to get which will drive the price up, such as the LCD touch bacpac, microSD card, backup batteries/charger, any special mounting gear you'll need for your application, and a case to protect it. Mine went from $200 to $375 just getting what I considered to be necessities. Also have read of some glitches in the firmware. My screen has frozen only once, which fixed with a simple power off/on. I also have not upgraded the software yet, which may or may not help.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: GoPro Ease
customer_reviews.text: Great product....easy to use (once you get it open!). Attachments help, and were simple and very self explanatory. Daughter, and two nephews call received new GoPros today, Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbzcc

customer_reviews.title: Great product. My son has taken multiple videos and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My son has taken multiple videos and the quality has been great. Easy to charge and even talked my dad into buying one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The best investment for fpv on my quads and planes. Great job with these cameras. Def recommend these for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin filek

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: works like a champ. only wish it came on camera, but well worth the additional money.better safe then sorry, so pick this uniy up. and never worry about water rain ice snow again
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great GoPro, worked as expected for a great price! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Chad/Jessica Haag

customer_reviews.title: Awsome but no better then the Hero 2
customer_reviews.text: Newer yes, but this version is no better then the hero 2. Actually the hero 2 has higher mp then the hero 3.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Shawn Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my grandson and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: THERESA JONES

customer_reviews.title: Super excited to start using it
customer_reviews.text: It arrived so quickly!! Super excited to start using it!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Twiford

customer_reviews.title: It is OK For A Paper Weight. Mine has ...
customer_reviews.text: It is OK For A Paper Weight. Mine has never operated and the Tech/ Service Help is equal to nada. Rodger
customer_reviews.author: Rodger

customer_reviews.title: It will be nice when we figure out how to stream this to ...
customer_reviews.text: It will be nice when we figure out how to stream this to a tv 100 feet away. We bought it for that purpose and have spent the last 7 months trying to make it work. Amazing how slow some projects can go when we don't want to hire capable help (that means $3,000 worth anyway.) Camera certainly seems to work fine for shooting stuff; just not streaming stuff as far as we've found out. There are a couple of videos on YouTube showing people streaming a good signal.
customer_reviews.author: SonnyM

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Great quality, great sound and very durable. No complaints at all! Works like a charm! So awesome!
customer_reviews.author: J. Claude

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal for money
customer_reviews.text: I had before GoPro2, so i knew what to expect. This is better version, for the same money. Only thing i don't like is MicroSD instead SD card. But that is minor. Deffinitelly recommend to buy. Aloha.
customer_reviews.author: petr

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera & video recorder. The video holder for my bike is a little shakey but other wise takes excellent videos of whatever you are doing!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J English

customer_reviews.title: It a Go Pro
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know why I keep getting bothered to rate this. If you want a lightweight 720P camera that is waterproof then get it.
customer_reviews.author: Gone Golfing

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who surfs year round...he took it on a surf trip with his friends and love it. He had a great trip and a great time documenting it!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy to have!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, does everything I need it to do! -Slow motion, phone/app control, waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Adam James Carnall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I Love my GoPro!! Super quality and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GoPro Hero3
customer_reviews.text: Bought the white edition to save a little cash, but it went above and beyond my initial expectation. Had the waterproof case on fit my recent trip in Cancun Mexico and had it for a 30 foot dive and some coral snorkeling and the shots and pics turned out amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he loves it! As he goes riding quite often he's never had issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: more than great
customer_reviews.text: it is amazing all the stuf you can record with this camera, great image quality and the go pro app solve the lack of the remote
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Exposito

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, he uses it all the time and loves it! The wifi option and ability to have video and photos directly upload to your phone is pretty amazing. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Not just for pro athletes
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit intimidated by the GoPro thinking that it's just for pro athletes but I got it anyway. Now I know, it's great for family trips and car dashboards too! On family trips it's great because it records so much better than a cell phone plus it doesn't use up the valuable cell phone memory. The size and waterproof case is also great for waterpark and beach trips.
customer_reviews.author: Love to shop online

customer_reviews.title: UnBeetleBle Fotoz
customer_reviews.text: Incredible footage & the app surprised me. As well as the ability to go under water to 60you meters I am verry happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Felix 305

customer_reviews.title: but the reason I give a 3 star rating is because the camera quality is not all that great. Everyone talks about GoPro bringing t
customer_reviews.text: The seller sent the item as promised, but the reason I give a 3 star rating is because the camera quality is not all that great. Everyone talks about GoPro bringing this amazing camera, but unless your outdoors in the daylight the picture quality of this camera is very mediocre. I think it's safe to say that my iPhone 6 takes better photos than this GoPro.
customer_reviews.author: Nay

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Takes good pic and video, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: larry chartier

customer_reviews.title: Awesome surf camera, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had the first GoPro but the display was hard to read so I couldn't tell if it was on or off and kept recording when did not want to and not recording when I did. The new GoPro Hero3 series has an easy to ready display which faces you when mounted on the surfboard. The perspective is great and really gives the viewer an idea of what it is like to be on the wave. The video quality is great and there are tons of cool other accessories. I love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Hepfer

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: Best gift ever. My son used it all summer long in Florida Very easy to use and great picture/video
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Forbis

customer_reviews.title: GoPro Hero3
customer_reviews.text: The camera it is fantastic, it takes great videos and appears to be very rugged. We used it while jumping off a 42' cliff into the water, several underwater shots, and diving through a water fall. The videos are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet camera
customer_reviews.text: Great picture keeps up with quick movement and live being able to control it with my iPhone. I would definently purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce75

customer_reviews.title: Great quality video and pictures
customer_reviews.text: Love our GoPro. We take it on all of our high adventures and love being able to have such high quality video and photos. The battery life is absolutely awful though. You have to either buy extra battery packs or be very diligent about remembering to charge it before every use. The camera is very easy to operate once you have used it once or twice.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her 1st ever purchase of this Go Pro!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera! Came in very speedy. In great condition. Can take hours of footage. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Mel

product_meta.title: GoPro HERO3: White Edition - (197'/ 60m Waterproof Housing)
product_meta.description:
Style:White EditionFROM THE MANUFACTURER
Smaller, lighter with built-in Wi-Fi
The HERO3: White Edition boasts the same high performance specs as the Original HD HERO camera it replaces, yet it has built-in Wi-Fi, new UI and is 30% smaller and 25% lighter. The HERO3: White Edition is wearable and gear mountable, waterproof to 197' (60m), and is capable of capturing 1080p 30 fps and 720p 60 fps video plus 5MP photos at a rate of 3 photos per second.

Professional Video and Photo
The HERO3: White Edition shoots professional quality video at 1080p-30, 720p-60, 960p-30 and WVGA-60. Photo resolution is 5 MP and shoots 3 frames per second in burst mode. Time lapse mode enables photo capture at .5, 2, 5, 10, 30 and 60 second intervals. All this is captures on the reduced-distortion lens and the redesigned, integrated, flat-lens housing.

Audio Performance
The HERO3 has a completely redesigned the audio system to greatly improve performance at capturing subtle sounds such as voice or music, as well as the sounds of sport. Included on the HERO3 is a port for a sold separately 3.5mm Stereo Mic Adapter.

Accessories
The GoPro HERO3 is compatible with all GoPro mounts for attaching to gear, body, helmets, vehicles, and more. The HERO3 is also compatible with the LCD Touch BacPac and the second generational Battery BacPac; and Backwards compatible with the older generation BacPac

What's in the box:


 * HERO3: White Edition Camera
 * 197’/ 60m Waterproof Housing*
 * Rechargeable Li-ion Battery
 * QR Buckle
 * 1 Curved Adhesive Mount
 * 1 Flat Adhesive Mount
 * Assorted Mounts and Hardware
 * USB Charging Cable


Required for use:
 * micro-SD Card (not included)



SET CONTAINS:


 * HERO3: White Edition Camera
 * 197’/ 60m Waterproof Housing*
 * Rechargeable Li-ion Battery
 * QR Buckle
 * 1 Curved Adhesive Mount
 * 1 Flat Adhesive Mount
 * Assorted Mounts and Hardware
 * USB Charging Cable
feature_bullets: Professional quality video capture in 1080p 30fps, 960p 30 fpts, 720p 60 fps, and WVGA 60 fps
Built in Wi-Fi compatible with the GoPro app for Smartphones/Tablets; as well as the Wi-Fi remote (available seperatly)
5 MP photos with 3 fps burst mode, and time lapse at .5, 2, 5, 10, 30, and 60 second intervals
197’/ 60m Waterproof Housing with integrated flat lense housing
Compatible with LCD Touch BacPac, and 2nd generation Battery Bacpac, as well as backward compatible with all older generation bacpacs
